description: Choose a school of magic. Any spells you cast of that school are more difficult to resist.

sections.text: Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against spells from the school of magic you select.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new school of magic.
sections.name: Special

name: Spell Focus
